author: vargasa
body:
DDCutTubsFromPoints Algorithm migration to `dd4hep`


Validation:

```
cmsRun DetectorDescription/DDCMS/test/python/testDDCutTubsFromPointsAlgorithm.py
./cmsShow -c simGeo.fwc --sim-geom-file cmsDD4HepGeom.root --tgeo-name=testCutTubsFromPointsAlgo
```
title: DD4Hep: DDCutTubsFromPoints Algorithm
